text: Lilith is the name of two fictional characters appearing in American comic books published by Marvel Comics. The first version is the daughter of Dracula. The second version is a demon. == Fictional character biography == She is a degenerated goddess loosely based on the villain of biblical lore. She is the self-proclaimed "Mother Of All Demons" in a similar manner to how Echidna is labelled the "Mother Of All Monsters" in Greek mythology. She is the main antagonist of the Midnight Sons series. == In other media == The character has appeared in toys, and video games. Dracula's daughter will be portrayed by Mia Goth in the upcoming Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) movie Blade. Category:Marvel Comics characters
title: Lilith (Marvel Comics)
